title: Day 16: Paralympic Preview with Chuck Aoki
description:
Two-time Paralympic medalist Chuck Aoki joins us to talk about the continuation of sports history this summer in Tokyo, his rugby wheelchair along with the increased visibility of the amazing stories that define the Paralympic games.

Watch the Paralympics starting August 24th on the networks of NBC.

In The Village takes you inside one of the most exclusive areas of the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games to discover the daily lives of athletes. Follow In the Village wherever you get your podcasts to automatically download every day until the closing ceremony.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Olympics)
